element.name: Maulin by albertw & min, Traditional Cache (2/3.5)
element.description: Regular cache near the summit of Maulin. Cache is not in the stone wall.
element.long-description:
This was to be the first of three caches I would hide. However due to bad weather it was only possible to place this one. And I don't even have any pictures as the camera battery died and the backup battery didn't work either. It was one of those days!
Heres a picture of the cache and the hills on a better day!
Maulin is one of the smaller mountains in Wicklow at 570m. The Wicklow Way passes just to the East of it and following that route to the hills to the south is a more popular route. However the views from Maulin are worth the detour. The whole Glensoulan valley is visible almost as far as Sally Gap, and bring a pair of binoculars to try and pick out deer in the valley.
The easiest way to approach the cache is by driving to Crón Wood car park. In summer this car park closes at 8pm; earlier in Winter. From the car park you make your way through the forest trails towards Maulin. As you leave the forest you can follow paths that will take you to the summit. The cache is placed a little distance from the summit.
The closest Public Transport is in the village of Eniskerry. If you take the public transport route I would advise that you stay overnight in the hostel in Knockree and use this as a base to explore some nearby caches. As with all caches in the Wicklow Mountains remember to have a sturdy pair of boots, a compass and, the Sheet 56 map.
The logs below mention an issue with the coords. This has been rectified and the coords given above are correct. Thanks!
Is féidir leat eolas breise a fháil nó caidéisí a dhéanamh ar -
element.additional-waypoints:
CP13WHV - Crón Car Park
N 53° 09.906 W 006° 13.069
Crón Wood Car Park

ul.li:
2010-06-12T19:00:00Z : Write note by daraconn
Passing by on the War Hill circuit, I stopped to check on this cache. I took a couple of geocoins.

2010-05-18T19:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
First find of the day on a day's hiking with Shailaja. TFTC Toffee Man. #345

2010-05-18T19:00:00Z : Found it by Shailaja
Found on a hike with Toffee Man. Good hide in a nice location. Enjoyed the view! TFTC Shailaja

2010-05-11T19:00:00Z : Found it by red6t6
TFTC We dropped two geocoins (GE73F9,QCFJRY).

2010-04-05T19:00:00Z : Found it by Determo
Nice walk, extremely windy at summit cairn, (hard to stay standing!) TFTC
